paragraphs.content: Chapter 10
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 10

paragraphs.content: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.

paragraphs.content: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

paragraphs.content: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.

paragraphs.content: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

paragraphs.content: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.

paragraphs.content: He was a mighty hunter before the LORD: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He was a mighty hunter before the Lord: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the Lord.

paragraphs.content: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.

paragraphs.content: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,

paragraphs.content: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.

paragraphs.content: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

paragraphs.content: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,

paragraphs.content: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,

paragraphs.content: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

paragraphs.content: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.

paragraphs.content: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboim, even unto Lasha.

paragraphs.content: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.

paragraphs.content: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.

paragraphs.content: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.

paragraphs.content: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.

paragraphs.content: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.

paragraphs.content: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

paragraphs.content: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

paragraphs.content: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

paragraphs.content: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.

paragraphs.content: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.

paragraphs.content: These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.

paragraphs.content: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
